name: A game to improve morality
description:
This game was created as part of a research project, to test if playing RPGs can improve the moral development of the player. The game challenges the player with a series of moral dilemmas, and reflective questions.

In the experiment the participants' moral development was measured (using a test called "DIT-2") before and after playing the game, and compared to a control group that simply took the test at the same times, but didn't play the game. The results showed a statistically significant improvement in moral judgement for the participants that played the game.

Game and research by András Baliga
